pages.text: Repeater is a type of point-type spell form that does not have any collisions and only repeats the post spells. When carrying the trace attribute, the direction of the post spells will be based on the direction of the target of the previous spell form. $(br)$(t:Effect of Spell Attributes on Functional Spells)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Magical Efficacy：$(/t)$(t:Functional spells will have their force bonus reduced to 0.2)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Force：0.2$(/t)$()$(t:The range of functional spells is unaffected)$(li2)$(#EE6363)Range：1.0$(/t)$()$(t:Functional spells will have their duration bonus reduced to 0.5)$(li2)$(#FFB90F)Duration：0.5$(/t)
